https://image.tmdb.org/t/p/w500/8sjPLwmbDLtFIHKGaqxPMME44XY.jpg On the eve of their wedding, Alison gets cold feet and decides to break up with her fianc√© Phil. But rather than face the embarrassment of calling off the ceremony, Alison suggests to Phil that they proceed with a sham wedding. Phil is more than game to try, secretly hoping that a surprise gift he has for Alison will ultimately change her mind. Yet once the guests begin to arrive, more complications ensue than either of them could have ever imagined - even if they did know their wedding was bullshit. Breakup at a Wedding
